title: About Me
subtitle: Get to know more about my journey and skills
story: I'm a passionate developer with a love for creating innovative solutions and beautiful user experiences. My journey in technology started several years ago, and I've been constantly learning and growing ever since.
I specialize in full-stack development, with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following industry best practices.

experience.description: Led development of multiple web applications, mentored junior developers, and implemented best practices for code quality and deployment processes.
Developed responsive websites and web applications using modern frameworks, collaborated with design teams, and optimized user experiences.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with focus on software engineering, data structures, algorithms, and web technologies.
